targets.expr:
from(bucket: "backup-metrics")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "backup_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "success")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "backup-metrics")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "backup_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "duration_seconds")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2h, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "backup-metrics")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "backup_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_size_bytes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2h, fn: last)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "backup-metrics")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "backup_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "success" or r._field == "duration_seconds" or r._field == "total_size_bytes")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 20)
